title: Sanderson Farms Recalls Poultry Products Due To Possible Foreign Matter Contamination
summary: EDITORS NOTE: This recall was updated on September 25, 2015 to reflect revised information on product weight and shipment. WASHINGTON, Sept. 24, 2015 Sanderson Farms, a Hazlehurst, Miss. establishment, is recalling approximately 554,090 pounds of poultry products that may be contaminated with extraneous metal materials...
